ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic

Class Items2Steps

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic.Items2Steps

  • public class Items2Steps
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the tools to create ResearchStack Steps from FHIR Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemComponents. Referenced ValueSets in getOptions() of ChoiceQuestions can only be resolved if included in the FHIR Questionnaire file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Returns a list of Steps and ConditionalSteps that can be added to a ConditionalOrderedTask.

      • Items2Steps

    • Method Detail

      • items2Steps

        public static java.util.List<org.researchstack.backbone.step.Step> items2Steps(java.util.List<org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemComponent> items)
        Returns a list of Steps and ConditionalSteps that can be added to a ConditionalOrderedTask. The Steps are created recursively from the passed List of Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemComponents. If a group item has Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemEnableWhenComponent conditions, these conditions are added to all the child steps as ResultRequirements
        Parameters:
        items - List of FHIR items that may contain more items
        Returns:
        List containing Steps and ConditionalSteps that can be added to a ConditionalOrderedTask

      • item2Step

        public static org.researchstack.backbone.step.Step item2Step(org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemComponent item)
        Returns a Step or ConditionalStep that can be added to a ConditionalOrderedTask. The Step is created from the passed Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemComponent. The item must be a leaf; child items are ignored. (Group items have to be passed in a list to items2Steps(List).) If the Item has Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemEnableWhenComponent conditions, these conditions are added to the step as ResultRequirements.
        Parameters:
        item - FHIR item, not of the type "group"
        Returns:
        Step or ConditionalStep that can be added to a ConditionalOrderedTask
